justifications: She narrowly escaped a gruesome tragedy when Bollywood tried to bludgeon her brain to the size of a pea, but she ducked at the right moment and escaped miraculously unharmed.
She is currently in the process of creating lame jokes like ' Why do all Hindu boys worship their mother? Because their religion tells them to worship the cow.'
One thing is there, today you people are saying British are fools, but no one makes brassieres better than their Marks and Spencer.

We then leave the consequences of Brexit along with our breakfast table to drive from Italy to Switzerland with just a nonchalant wave to the lone guard standing at the border gate. Long live the European Union!

'Brexit is a reality!' scream headlines and as people at the tables around us begin diluting their fresh orange juice with tears, watching their shares in Barclays and Lloyds drop down the rabbit hole.

One thing is there, today you people are saying British are fools, but no one makes brassieres better than their Marks and Spencer.
